item.title: Angle of Attack Sensor Heater Systems

remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided aircraft is not operated in known or forecast icing conditions.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Operations into known or forecast icing conditions is prohibited.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "___ AOA HEATER INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
